name: umgruhgr

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ UMGraph, c0 ∈ UHGraph, c0 ∈ UPGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UPGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UPGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UPGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)

comment: An undirected multigraph is an undirected hypergraph. (Contributed by AV, 26-Nov-2020.)
